Header: Wew Dahasai – Gam Dahasai program in Embilipitiya
Content: Another phase of the Wew Dahasai – Gam Dahasai development program was implemented at the Kornkatuwa area in Embilipitiya. Several projects including the development of the Kornkatuwa tank will be done under the program. Renovating of the Korn-katuwa Tank under the Wew Dahasai Gam Dahasai development program commenced under the patronage of Minister Mahinda Amaraweera. Infrastructure of the area will be developed to coincide with the program. The Minister distributed seeds for home gardening and organic fertilizer among the farmers.
